definition: lit. grass-cutter's comment (humble); fig. my observation as a humble layman/my humble opinion

sentences.english: This paper provides a proposal to solve the problems related to school buildings.
sentences.chinese: 本文即针对此一问题，提出解决之刍议。

sentences.english: The small four-wheeled tractor industry in China has been analysed and proposals for the future development of the industry have been presented.
sentences.chinese: 分析了小四轮拖拉机行业现状，刍议行业发展趋势。

definition: to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
my unworthy writing (humble expr.)/my worthless manuscript
variant of 按語|按语[an4 yu3]
to clear up/to wipe out/to eradicate
my unworthy manuscript (humble expr.)/my humble writing
same as 總而言之|总而言之[zong3 er2 yan2 zhi1]
(often used in book or chapter titles) general introduction/overview
